title: Dream Theater - Chaos in Motion 2007-2008 DVD2 - Collectors Edit
description: Chaos in Motion 2007ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“2008 is a DVD from the progressive metal band Dream Theater. Released on September 30, 2008, the DVD contains a compilation of live concerts from the band's Chaos in Motion world tour, for their latest album Systematic Chaos.[1][2] The tour, which lasted from June 3, 2007 to June 4, 2008, contained 115 shows throughout 35 countries.[3] Two forms of the DVD were released, a 2-disc set and a 5-disc (2 DVD, 3 CD) special edition.[4] The special edition was limited to 5,000 copies.[5] The DVD is the band's first since 2006's Score; and the band's first release overall since their Greatest Hit album.
